Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: When I dont understand something even if its a super simple concept, Ive asked repeatedly to make it easier for me to understand and AI just does it quick and simple, without judgement and straight to the point. I dont have to deal with weird interactions from other people.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Absolutely. I can ask even the easiest and more basic concepts with NO judgement. The teachers have an amount of time to give the class or practice. With AI there's no need to rush anything, theres full availability from me and no bias. Somehow makes you feel safe to ask and go to your own rhythm

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI give you more options, more results. Previous searches stay in the convo to look again later. Again no bias or weird faces
